conclusion: Analyze the braking process of the truck and the bus based on their respective v-t graphs.
The v-t graph of the truck shows it starts braking at 10 seconds and stops at 30 seconds.
The v-t graph of the bus shows it starts braking at 20 seconds and stops at 30 seconds.
Truck's initial velocity is 40 m/s and final velocity is 0 m/s.
Bus's initial velocity is 30 m/s and final velocity is 0 m/s.
Truck's distance traveled is calculated as 40 m/s × 10 s = 400 m.
Bus's distance traveled is calculated as 30 m/s × 10 s = 300 m.
Maximum distance between the two vehicles occurs when the truck and the bus have traveled the same distance.
The maximum distance between the two vehicles is 400 meters - 300 meters = 100 meters.
